"Vacuum Vortex" - A futuristic vacuum cleaner that utilizes advanced vortex technology to pick up dirt and debris with unprecedented efficiency. The sleek and compact design makes it easy to maneuver and store, while the LED display shows the remaining battery life and cleaning mode.

"Clean Wave" - A cordless vacuum cleaner that harnesses the power of ocean waves to clean your floors. The device uses a unique water filtration system to convert seawater into cleaning solution, making it a sustainable and eco-friendly option.

"Dirt Destroyer" - A high-tech vacuum cleaner that utilizes advanced AI technology to identify and eliminate dirt and debris. The device can recognize different types of dirt and adjust its cleaning mode accordingly, ensuring a thorough and efficient cleaning.

"Sonic Blast" - A portable and lightweight vacuum cleaner that uses sonic technology to blast away dirt and debris. The device is powered by a rechargeable battery and comes with interchangeable cleaning heads for different cleaning tasks.

"Clean Air" - A vacuum cleaner that not only cleans your floors but also purifies the air in your home. The device uses a advanced air filtration system to remove pollutants and allergens, creating a healthier environment for you and your family.
